column2: over hyped and just average food.   I will never make an effort to just go there
column3: maybe if am close by?    Despite having a reservation on two occasions
column4: we still waited 45 minutes for our table and for the mediocre food.    I expect more from a Top Chef winner who I support at her other ventures.    You can do much better
column5: but seems like the folks who frequent here just want to trendy and will pack it and not demand better food.
